creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
inscription:
right side box:poem(waka) of Shun'e 
left side box:probably profile of Shun'e stated with His father is Minamoto no Toshiyori (chichi wa Toshiyori no ason)
medium: From a woodblock printed book, ink on paper
provenance: Frederick W. Gookin; Ruth Lathrop Sikes (until 1967)
title: Monk Shun'e
